Load the data from 528 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

donation_df = read_csv("sports-political-donations.csv")

donation_df

```

```{r}

donation_df$Amount = parse_number(donation_df$Amount)

donation_df

```

```{r}

donations_by_party = donation_df |>
  group_by(Party) |>
  summarise(total = sum(Amount)) |>
  arrange(desc(total))

donations_by_party
```
